class.name: StreamPeerSocket
class.brief_description: Abstract base class for interacting with socket streams.
class.description: StreamPeerSocket is an abstract base class that defines common behavior for socket-based streams.

method.name: get_status
method.description: Returns the status of the connection.

method.name: poll
method.description: Polls the socket, updating its state. See [method get_status].
